content.value:
Bogota, the capital of Colombia, is the meeting point for people from all regions, which makes it diverse and multicultural. This is the right place for our guests, in a spectacular architecturally preserved house in a very central part of Bogotá, from Maité it's easy to not only visit downtown historical city center, but also discover the Internacional Center which is within walking distance, or go up north and see the modern, fancy part of town! There is a Transmilenio stop just 1 block away from the hostel, which makes it easy to move around in the city.

Providing free WiFi, Maité offers accommodation in Bogotá, 2.2 km from El Campin Stadium. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Guests can make use of a garden.

The hostel offers a continental or à la carte breakfast.

Corferias International Exhibition Center is 2.4 km from Maité, while El Campin Coliseum is 2.5 km from the property

description.description: Maité Hostel offers shared and private rooms and dorms with free breakfast and WiFi, garden and terrace in the sector of Teusaquillo de Bogotá Here you will find the perfect mix between comfort, rest and culture, people from all over the world come to Maité Hostel.
